alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 9:11PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Collingsworth and northeastern Donley Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 910 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Dozier to 4 miles northeast of Lelia Lake. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Hedley, Dodson, Lutie, Dozier, Quail and Samnorwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
